findings.rationale: Absence of indemnification obligations can expose parties to significant financial risk in case of legal claims arising from the agreement.
findings.evidence_quote: No indemnification obligations apply under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: The absence of audit rights limits transparency and oversight, potentially allowing breaches of confidentiality to go undetected.
findings.evidence_quote: No audit rights are granted under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Limitation of liability clauses can create uncertainty regarding potential financial exposure, particularly in the absence of indemnification.
findings.evidence_quote: Limitation of liability shall not apply to indemnification, except as required by applicable law.
